    )
  body=

      block_items[0]=
        Decl(
          name='somme',
          quals=[],

          funcspec=[],
          type=
            TypeDecl(
              declname='somme',
              quals=[],

                  names=['double'],

            DeclList(

                Decl(
                  name='i',
                  quals=[],

                  type=

                        )
                    )

                    Constant(

                      value='0',
                    )

              left=
                ID(
                  name='i',
                )

                ID(
                  name='taille',
                )
            )

            UnaryOp(
              op='p++',
              expr=
                ID(
                  name='i',
                )
            )
          stmt=
            Compound(
              block_items[0]=
                Assignment(
                  op='+=',
                  lvalue=
                    ID(
                      name='somme',
                    )
                  rvalue=
                    StructRef(
                      type='.',
                      name=
                        ArrayRef(

                            ID(

                            )
                          subscript=
                            ID(
                              name='i',
                            )
                        )
                      field=
                        ID(
                          name='temperature',
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[2]=
        Return(
          expr=
            BinaryOp(
              op='/',
              left=
                ID(
                  name='somme',
                )
              right=
                ID(
                  name='taille',
                )
            )
        )
    )
)
